mapper.delete: delete from love where userid=#{userid} and write_code=#{write_code}
mapper.select: select count(*) from love where write_code=#{write_code}

select p.userid, p.subject, p.price,p.contents,p.filename,l.write_code,p.status_code from product p,love l where p.write_code = l.write_code and l.userid=#{userid} and status_code = 0 order by l.write_code
